select aa.*, (select NVL(count(*),0) from class_info ci, class_date cd, class_apply ca where ci.class_num = cd.class_num and cd.date_num =ca.date_num and ca.apply_auth=1 and cd.class_num =aa.class_num) people, (select nvl(count(*),0) from wishlist where class_num=aa.class_num) wish_count
from (select ci.class_num, ci.tutor_nickname, ci.class_title, ci.class_auth, ci.class_address, pi.pro_img from class_info ci, profile_img pi where ci.pro_num = pi.pro_num and ci.class_auth=1) aa;
